channel.title: Dementedx [PI] loads of custom content has torva w/ hp effect
channel.description:
hey this is my server dementedx this is a server that leechers can leech and take all credit for as everything has been done for them
what i have added awesome shops ready made economy custom boss drops custom point system level point shop all skills work summoning fixed all pouches work added nomad added torva and dung items added corp theiving stalls vote shop custom home donor zone donator shops ::food ::veng ::pot ::barrage donator chest and much more.........
to come in v2 (releasing with 75 rep) nex boss with drops new point system npc kill shop tokkul shop rares shop donator point shop ::vote ::donate and much more.......
in v3 (200 rep) grand exchange (fully working no bugs) customs death cape coloured phats ornate katana and light sabres make a pk version of my server and add a new custom pk area (pyramids of zen)
here are some pics
[img]http://mob1352.photobucket.com/albums/q656/dementedxrsps/theive_zps424d6fde.jpg[/img]
[img]http://mob1352.photobucket.com/albums/q656/dementedxrsps/home_zps7df56f2b.jpg[/img]
[img]http://mob1352.photobucket.com/albums/q656/dementedxrsps/shop_zpse68acaa3.jpg[/img]
I'm not really looking for a load of downloads and rep i just wanna help ppl if u rep i will release more
source http://www.mediafire.com/?m0fzdbfsis7okkr

item.source: Dementedx [PI] loads of custom content has torva w/ hp effect

item.title: Dementedx [PI] loads of custom content has torva w/ hp effect
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

[quote=".:, post:45, topic:464560"][quote author=JavaTC link=topic=568602.msg4128631#msg4128631 date=1350783785]

If you shoot him down he won’t want to continue and learn more about java. Everyone releases something like this for their first release. I have’t seen any of you program anything lately that’s any better than this.
[/quote]What? This doesn’t look like he wants to learn anything.

Everyone’s first server wasn’t based on the code but the best visual content of the time. he modified a few things and released it. When your new that’s expected. And no you’ll drive them away with anger and they’ll quit before they have a chance to learn.

They also have to learn to accept criticism from the public and not get butthurt over a single groups’ opinion, something that the OP clearly lacks.

Criticism would be giving him advice on his code or layout, not flaming him and constantly posting ‘leecher’ as an attempt to raise your post count…[/quote]
Who cares about post count when I’m already Moparian? I don’t even post here as much as I used to.

And no, criticism does not have to be advice, many critics will actually bash things they feel are bad, they don’t sit here and say “oh man this is no good but im sure ur awesume cuz we live in teletubby land”. Is flaming good? No. However, he must learn from his mistakes because if we baby him and say “LOOKS FUCKIN GREAT MAN” with everything he releases then he’ll never advance and get better at this.

If he doesn’t want to then he has no need to release this. We have many bases like this for people to use as they will posted here, we don’t need to continue the spam.

Read full topic
